news.title: Blue Lake Announces New Album The Animal, Shares New Song “Cut Paper”: Listen
news.summary: Jason Dungan’s proper follow-up to 2023’s Sun Arcs is out in the autumn via Tonal Union

news.title: American Football to Share New Live in Los Angeles Concert Film
news.summary: The film, which documents the 25th-anniversary tour for the band’s debut album, captures a performance at El Rey Theatre

news.title: Sean “Diddy” Combs Guilty of Prostitution Charges but Cleared of Racketeering and Sex Trafficking
news.summary: The hip-hop mogul is cleared of three of the five charges in his federal trial

news.title: Foo Fighters Share New Song “Today’s Song”: Listen
news.summary: The rock band’s first original music since releasing But Here We Are in 2023

news.title: Mina Tindle and Sufjan Stevens Share New Song “Heaven Thunder”: Listen
news.summary: The French indie-folk artist previously collaborated with Stevens on the 2020 single “Give a Little Love”
